title: Sorry gamers, the Steam Deck 2 is a long way off
description: According to a statement from Steam Deck designer Lawrence Yang, the Steam Deck 2 won't be releasing anytime soon.

title: Here's another really good reason not to illegally stream films online
description: Criminals found abusing Google Ads on dodgy streaming sites, and netting big profits, researchers found.

title: Google cans the Chrome Cleanup Tool – here's how you can protect your PC
description: Google announced that it's finally retiring its now obsolete Chrome Cleanup Tool, which has been around since 2015.

description: A hyperscale cloud with AI, HPC, and quantum is the future, Microsoft thinks, and developers can start creating hybrid apps today.

title: This "Wi-Fi 7 cryptomining router" is just an elaborate scam
description: Someone's impersonating TP-Link, and trying to trick victims into buying a Wi-Fi router/cryptocurrency miner.

description: Western executives and politicians are being invited to video calls with people impersonating Ukrainian officials.
